description: Job Market Intelligence Database - Data Sources and API Resources

usajobs_gov.name: USAJobs.gov API
usajobs_gov.description: Federal job postings from the U.S. Office of Personnel Management

job_details.description: Get detailed information for a specific job posting

usage_notes: API key required - register at https://developer.usajobs.gov/APIRequest/Index
User-Agent header is mandatory
DatePosted parameter: use number of days (e.g., 14 for last 2 weeks)
Results are paginated - use Page parameter for additional results
Job descriptions contain HTML formatting
Location data includes city, state, and ZIP code

bls_public_data.name: BLS Public Data API
bls_public_data.description: Bureau of Labor Statistics public data API for employment statistics, wage data, and labor market information

authentication.note: Registration key increases rate limits. Get key at https://www.bls.gov/developers/api_signature.htm

timeseries_data.description: Retrieve time series data for employment statistics

parameters.seriesid: BLS series ID (e.g., 'LAUCN040010000000003' for unemployment rate)

single_series.description: Get single time series data point

usage_notes: Registration key recommended for higher rate limits
Series IDs follow BLS naming conventions
Data is available with various lags (typically 1-2 months)
Use POST method for multiple series requests
Geographic codes: FIPS state/county codes
Time series data includes annual and monthly frequencies

dol_open_data.name: Department of Labor Open Data Portal
dol_open_data.description: DOL open data portal via Data.gov CKAN API for employment statistics and job market trends

authentication.note: API key available at https://api.data.gov/signup/ for higher rate limits

usage_notes: Uses Data.gov CKAN API
Filter by organization:dol-gov for DOL-specific datasets
Resources may be CSV, JSON, XML, or other formats
Download actual data files via resource URLs
Datasets include employment statistics, wage data, job market trends

data_gov_api.description: Direct API access to data.gov resources (requires API key)

state_employment_boards.name: State Employment Board APIs
state_employment_boards.description: Various state-level employment and labor market APIs
state_employment_boards.note: State-specific APIs vary by state. Common sources include state labor departments and workforce development agencies.
usage_notes: State APIs vary significantly in availability and format
Many states provide data via web scraping or CSV downloads
Check individual state labor department websites
Some states participate in federal data sharing programs

api_keys_configuration.note: Store API keys as environment variables, never commit to version control

environment_variables.BLS_REGISTRATION_KEY: BLS Public Data API registration key (optional but recommended)
environment_variables.DATA_GOV_API_KEY: Data.gov API key (optional, for higher rate limits)

setup_instructions: 1. Register for USAJobs API key at https://developer.usajobs.gov/APIRequest/Index
2. (Optional) Register for BLS registration key at https://www.bls.gov/developers/api_signature.htm
3. (Optional) Sign up for Data.gov API key at https://api.data.gov/signup/

incremental_load.retention: Keep historical data for trend analysis

data_priorities: 2. BLS Public Data - Employment statistics and wage data
3. DOL Open Data Portal - Job market trends and analytics
4. State employment boards - Regional job market data (as available)

coordinate_systems.note: Job market data primarily uses geographic identifiers (city, state, ZIP) rather than coordinates

best_practices: Respect rate limits - implement exponential backoff retry logic
Cache API responses when possible to reduce API calls
Handle API errors gracefully with retry mechanisms
Store API keys as environment variables, never in code or JSON files
Log all API requests for debugging and monitoring
Implement incremental loads based on date filters
Validate data quality before loading into database
Track data lineage and source metadata for all extracted data
Use User-Agent header for USAJobs API (required)
Monitor API usage to stay within rate limits
